name: 'Hammering' This One Home Online Trivia | Thematic Objects | 10 Questions

questions.text: Name the great American song writing duo?
questions.explanation:
Rodgers and Hammerstein.

	Richard Rodgers did the music and Oscar Hammerstein did the lyrics.

questions.text: Peter, Paul and Mary had a hammer related hit. What was it called?
questions.explanation:
If I Had a Hammer.

	'If I Had A Hammer' was written by Pete Seeger in 1949.

questions.text: The popular TV detective Mike Hammer was created by which author?
questions.explanation:
Mickey Spillane.

	Mike Hammer was played by Stacy Keach.

questions.text: Hammersmith is in which part of London, England?
questions.explanation:
West.

	Hammersmith is an area of West London once famous for rock concert venues.

questions.text: What Beatles song had hammer in its title?
questions.explanation:
Maxwell's Silver Hammer.

	The song is from the album 'Abbey Road', released in 1969 and it was their last unified statement.

questions.text: What is the name of the Olympic event in which a metallic weight attached to a steel wire is thrown?
questions.correct: Hammer & Hammer Throw & Hammerthrow & hammer toss
questions.explanation:
Hammer & Hammer Throw & Hammerthrow & hammer toss.

	The 'Hammer' weighs 16 pounds.  The event is also called the Hammer Throw.

questions.text: What is the real name of Rapper M.C. Hammer?
What is the name of the popular household product company, which is a division of Church and Dwight Inc.?
questions.explanation:
Arm and Hammer.

	Arm and Hammer have made various products for more than 150 years.

questions.text: The hammerhead shark is one of a distinctive and an aggressive type of shark. Its eyes and nostrils are found at the end of each hammer-like lobe of the head.
questions.explanation:
True.

	These sharks can grow up to 20 feet in length.

questions.text: Name the American industrialist who was CEO of Occidental Petroleum?
questions.explanation:
Armand Hammer.

	Armand Hammer established trade links with the USSR in the 1920s. He was an art collector and died in 1990.
